item.title: Errors, Not Sure How To Fix
item.dc:creator: @Playernt Playernt
item.description:
@Playernt wrote:

I get this error:

.\Server\Server.java:60: <identifier> expected ioThread = new IOThread(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:61: illegal start of type (new Thread(ioThread)).start(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:61: ';' expected (new Thread(ioThread)).start(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:61: invalid method declaration; return type required (new Thread(ioThread)).start(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:61: <identifier> expected (new Thread(ioThread)).start(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:61: ';' expected (new Thread(ioThread)).start(); ^ 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .

This is the section of code:

public static PlayerHandler playerHandler = new PlayerHandler(); ioThread = new IOThread(); (new Thread(ioThread)).start(); public static NPCHandler npcHandler = new NPCHandler();

How can I fix?

Read full topic
item.source: Errors, Not Sure How To Fix
